cgcloud__Batch_Run_Status__c.description: Reference to the main Batch Monitoring record.

cgcloud__Entry_Date__c.description: Time stamp of the API call that created this entry.

cgcloud__Error_Value__c.description: Error summary that contains information about the issue that a batch process encountered.

cgcloud__KPI_Value__c.description: Summary that contains relevant KPIs of the batch process execution.

cgcloud__Progress_Value__c.description: Value that indicates the progress of the batch process.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Links to the detail record page.
